translation.en: Everyone has a special story
Every voice has a melody
We can bring our worlds together
When we sing in harmony
Not quite ocean, not quite land
translation.es: No en el océano, no en la tierra

translation.en: So I go with the flow And I know who I am
translation.es: Así que sigo el flujo Cuando sé quién soy

translation.en: Not quite ocean, not quite land
translation.es: No en el océano, no en la tierra

translation.en: So I go with the flow And I know who I am
translation.es: Así que sigo el flujo Cuando sé quién soy

translation.en: Okay. Ready?
No, wait.
We go, da, da, da.
then, da, da, da, again,
then you go and I go, and then: Ta- da!
translation.es: tú haces y yo hago, y entonces:

translation.en: Got it. Ready?
- You make a great dance partner, Pixie. - You too.
- I need water. - Me too.
Last one to the stream is a rotten fluffernut.
translation.es: El último es una fruta podrida.

translation.en: We just sighed the same.
I just love it when the wind blows through my mane.
translation.es: Amo el viento en mi crin.

translation.en: I just love it too.
So breezy.
Kelp, I just figured out something really, really, really,
translation.es: Kelp, acabo de pensar en algo muy, muy, muy

translation.en: really, really, really amazing.
That's six reallys.
It's six. Trust me.
We both like dancing
and drinking from the stream and warm breezes.
translation.es: y beber del arroyo y la brisa cálida.

translation.en: Yep, we do.
That means something big, don't you think?
Yeah, I think.
- What do I think? - It means we're not just friends.
We're better than friends.
We're best friends.
We are best friends.
And as best friends, we need...
Best- friend horn toppers.
One for you and one for me.
translation.es: Uno para ti y uno para mí.

translation.en: I like this look. Thank you, Pixie.
translation.es: Amo cómo se ve. Gracias, Pixie.

translation.en: What are best friends for?
Now come on. I have something to show you.
There's more?
Whoa. Fun clouds.
It's actually why I brought you here.
- Didn't you invite everyone here today? - Yeah.
But I invited you early.
I wanted you to be the first to see.
I could watch these all day.
- Kelp, we don't just watch them. - Huh?
We ride them.
I love it.
I knew you would. Jump on one.
Uh- oh. Did you fall off?
No, I hopped off.
But the fun is staying on the cloud.
translation.es: Pero es divertido quedarte en la nube.

translation.en: - Come on, try again. - Uh...
Bumper clouds.
Even more fun.
Why do you keep hopping off?
Well, I guess because I don't really like riding on them.
translation.es: Creo que porque no me gusta montarlas.

translation.en: I don't like going that fast. And the bumps? Not for me.
translation.es: No me gusta ir rápido. Y los choques no son lo mío.

translation.en: But that's impossible.
I love riding on the clouds.
That's great. Then hop back on.
But we're best friends.
We like the same things.
I like watching the clouds. And look.
translation.es: Me gusta ver las nubes. Y mira.

translation.en: Everyone else is coming.
Maybe they can ride with you, and I can watch.
translation.es: Pueden ir contigo y yo veré.

translation.en: What do you think about that idea, Pixie? Pixie?
I think I don't want to play anymore.
translation.es: Creo que ya no quiero jugar.

translation.en: Pixie.
Kelp, where's Pixie's going? She said she had a surprise to show us.
translation.es: Kelp, ¿a dónde va Pixie? Dijo que tenía una sorpresa.

translation.en: Knowing Pixie, it's gonna be really good.
translation.es: Conociendo a Pixie será muy buena.

translation.en: Is it tacos? I hope it's tacos.
Kelp, is it tacos?
- Do you know what it is, Kelp? - Mm- hm.
Sad Kelp? That's not a good surprise.
Pixie actually had a really good surprise.
translation.es: Pixie tenía una sorpresa muy buena.

translation.en: - Whoa. - Fun clouds.
Fun clouds.
And I know she really wanted to show you all,
but she just ran off, and I don't know why.
translation.es: pero huyó y no sé por qué.

translation.en: Let's ask her. Where did she go?
I don't know, but we should find her and make sure she's okay.
translation.es: No sé, pero veamos que esté bien.

translation.en: - Okay. Let's go. - We'll check all her favorite places.
He was supposed to like the fun clouds because I like the fun clouds.
translation.es: Debían gustarle las nubes graciosas porque a mí me gustan.

translation.en: Right?
Like you two.
I can tell you're best friends because you like to walk the same.
translation.es: Sé que son mejores amigos porque caminan igual.

translation.en: Never lose your bond.
It's so special.
- Pixie? Pixie? - Where are you, Pixie?
- Pixie! - Where are you, Pixie?
Pixie!
Where are you, Pixie?
Pixie? You in here?
I don't think she's in the log.
Hey, you never know.
Well, it's official. She's not at the market.
translation.es: Es oficial. No está en el mercado.

translation.en: But these were.
I still don't know why she ran off like that.
translation.es: Aún no sé porqué corrió así.

translation.en: It is strange. Did anything happen before she ran off?
translation.es: Es raro. ¿No pasó nada antes de que corriera?

translation.en: Yes, tell us everything.
Well, first I made my bed, cleaned my room, danced a little,
translation.es: Primero tendí mi cama, limpié mi habitación, bailé,

translation.en: had squid- ink pancakes for breakfast, then I--
Okay. Maybe not everything everything.
Remember when we used to drink from the stream together?
Your friendship is so beautiful.
I used to have a best friend like that.
translation.es: Yo tenía un mejor amigo así.

translation.en: Aw. You're on his face right now.
Pixie!
Pixie?
Not Pixie.
But fun.
Pixie?
Uh... I don't think she's in the hole.
You know, I don't either anymore,
but it does feel good to dig.
So before she ran off,
you two shared your love of dancing, drinking from streams,
translation.es: ¿compartieron su amor por el baile, beber en arroyos

translation.en: and warm breezes?
Yep. Then she showed me the fun clouds.
translation.es: Sí. Y me enseñó las nubes.

translation.en: She had a lot of fun riding around on them.
But if she suddenly ran off, something must have upset her.
translation.es: Pero si de pronto huyó, algo debió molestarla.

translation.en: - What? - Maybe I upset Pixie.
Kelp.
What's this thing?
It's her best- friend horn topper.
- The good news is that she was here. - Yeah.
We need to keep checking in her favorite places.
Yeah. We'd better keep looking.
Keep doing everything together, little frogs.
Don't lose your best friend, like I did.
translation.es: No pierdan su amistad como yo.

translation.en: - Pixie! Pixie! - Aw.
I'm thinking about Kelp so much it's like I can hear him.
translation.es: Pienso tanto en Kelp que es como si lo oyera.

translation.en: Pixie? Pixie!
- There you are. - It's Pixie!
We found her!
I knew she'd be at the blindersploot tree.
translation.es: Sabía que estaría en el árbol.

translation.en: Hey, Juni. Why don't we hang back?
- Why? - They just need a second.
Pixie, I missed you.
You came looking for me?
Of course I did. You're my best friend.
And you ran off.
Why'd you run off?
I was sad that we couldn't be best friends anymore.
translation.es: Es triste que ya no somos mejores amigos.

translation.en: Why can't we be best friends anymore?
Because... Because...
Look at the frogs.
I'm looking, but I don't get it.
Best friends are supposed to do and like all the same things.
translation.es: Los mejores amigos deben hacer las mismas cosas.

translation.en: Look at the way these frogs hop the same.
I loved the fun clouds, but you didn't like them at all.
translation.es: Adoro las nubes graciosas, pero a ti no te gustan.

translation.en: So we can't be best friends.
Really? I'm not sure that's true.
translation.es: ¿No? No sé si eso es cierto.

translation.en: Of course it's true.
See the frogs?
Huh. One liked splashing in the water, the other one didn't.
translation.es: Una salpica en el agua pero la otra no.

translation.en: I think we are best friends like the frogs. You know how I know?
translation.es: Somos amigos como las ranas. ¿Sabes cómo lo sé?

translation.en: Because we had so much fun today.
And when you ran off, I was worried and I missed you.
translation.es: y cuando huiste me preocupé y te extrañé.

translation.en: I missed you too.
And it's because we're so different that we became friends in the first place.
translation.es: Y por ser tan diferentes nos volvimos amigos en primer lugar.

translation.en: It is?
Yeah. If I had been just like you,
translation.es: Sí. Si hubiera sido como tú,

translation.en: then you wouldn't have had to teach me about being a unicorn.
translation.es: no me enseñarías a ser unicornio.

translation.en: That's true.
Maybe it's even a good thing that we're a little different?
And we can still be best friends?
- Of course. - Mm.
- Oh, no. - What?
I took off my horn topper.
I got you, best friend.
- Thank you, Kelp. - What are best friends for?
- Whee! Hey, Kelp? - Yeah?
- Five, six, seven, eight. - Five, six, seven, eight.
Here we are in my sunny spot.
Feel the warm sun on your back.
translation.es: Siente el sol en tu espalda.

translation.en: Take a deep breath in.
Ollie, can I breathe out now?
- What are you looking at? - It's here.
My floating white rock.
It doesn't come often.
That's why it's always so special when I see it.
translation.es: Por eso es especial cuando la veo.

translation.en: Oh! Look, it sprays water too.
That's not a floating white rock. That's the White Whale.
translation.es: No es una roca flotante. Es una ballena blanca.

translation.en: My rock's a whale?
Are you for real?
Yeah. The White Whale is my friend.
translation.es: La ballena blanca es mi amiga.

translation.en: They come by once a year on their way to warmer waters.
translation.es: Pasan una vez al año hacia aguas cálidas.

translation.en: My rock's a whale.
Just magic.
There must be so much magic under the sea, and I don't know any of it.
translation.es: Hay tanta magia bajo el agua y no sé nada de ella.

translation.en: I agree. The sea is magical.
And the White Whale is the best.
translation.es: Y la ballena blanca es la mejor.

translation.en: We always throw a party and cheer as they swim past.
translation.es: Siempre damos una fiesta y la saludamos cuando pasa.

translation.en: But the White Whale's there, and you're here.
translation.es: Pero ella está ahí y tú aquí.

translation.en: Oh, no. You'll miss the whole thing.
Nah, they're still pretty far away.
That's why they look so small.
They're actually really big.
How big?
Well, they're just one whale,
but they're as big as maybe a hundred of these clouds.
translation.es: es tan grande como cien de estas nubes.

translation.en: No way.
That's big.
It would be such a dream to see the White Whale up close like that.
translation.es: Sería un sueño ver a la ballena blanca así de cerca.

translation.en: Yep.
Imagine, I might even be able to reach out and shake their fin.
translation.es: Imagina, hasta podría estrechar su aleta.

translation.en: Yep.
But we all know that could never happen.
translation.es: Pero sabemos que eso no sucederá.

translation.en: Why could that never happen?
Why could what never happen?
Why could what never happen, I said?
Why can't Ollie come underwater with me and meet the White Whale?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no puede ir bajo el agua y conocer a la ballena?

translation.en: A unicorn underwater?
Now, that's funny.
I'm a unicorn. I go underwater.
translation.es: Soy unicornio. Voy bajo el agua.

translation.en: You don't count.
Do you really think I could?
Well, Kelp can, obviously.
But before we met him, unicorns didn't even go out in the rain.
translation.es: Pero antes de conocerlo los unicornios no salían ni a la lluvia.

translation.en: - Do you know how to swim? - No.
I can teach you.
Yeah, Kelp can teach me.
What about breathing? How are you gonna breathe underwater?
Oh, right. That whole breathing thing.
I can make you a bubble, for your head.
translation.es: Haré una burbuja para tu cabeza.

translation.en: Yeah, Kelp can make me a bubble.
translation.es: Sí, Kelp me hará una burbuja.

translation.en: Okay.
Well, I guess I'm here to help however I can.
translation.es: Supongo que ayudaré en lo que pueda.

translation.en: Me too.
I'm here to help too.
But before we all help, what's the White Whale?
translation.es: Pero antes de ayudar, ¿qué es la ballena blanca?

translation.en: I see a white dot or something.
translation.es: Veo un punto blanco o algo.

translation.en: Is that them?
You wanna go under the sea to meet a white dot?
translation.es: ¿Quieres bajar a conocer un punto blanco?

translation.en: Actually, it's not a white dot.
It's Kelp's friend the White Whale.
translation.es: Es la ballena amiga de Kelp.

translation.en: And up close, they're the size of a hundred elevator clouds.
translation.es: Y de cerca es grande como cien nubes elevadoras.

translation.en: They're bigger now. They're getting closer.
translation.es: Ya son más grandes. Se están acercando.

translation.en: We've gotta get to work
if we're gonna make you underwater- ready in time.
translation.es: si quieres estar listo a tiempo.

translation.en: Yes!
There, I'm ready to get underwater- ready.
- What's next? - I teach you how to swim.
Kick, kick, kick.
Kick, kick, kick.
This is teaching him how to swim?
Yep. In the water, if he kicks his legs like this,
translation.es: Sí. En el agua, si patea con sus piernas así

translation.en: he'll be swimming.
Just be supportive.
- Kick, kick, kick. - Kick, kick, kick.
Kick, kick, kick.
Ollie, if this is gonna work,
translation.es: Ollie, si esto va a funcionar,

translation.en: you have to actually go in the water.
But I, uh, just did my hooves.
translation.es: Pero acabo de pintar mis pezuñas.

translation.en: Water isn't gonna ruin your hoof polish.
translation.es: El agua no arruinará tu barniz.

translation.en: The sand feels so squishy.
Squishy, squishy, squishy.
Juniper, watch where you're galloping.
Come on, Ollie. Just take one step.
translation.es: Vamos, Ollie. Solo da un paso.

translation.en: That's it. Now the other hoof.
translation.es: Eso es. Ahora la otra pezuña.

translation.en: There you go.
I did it. I'm in the water.
translation.es: Lo hice. Estoy en el agua.

translation.en: You've only got two hooves in the water.
translation.es: Solo tienes dos pezuñas en el agua.

translation.en: You need your whole body in the water if you're gonna meet the White Dot.
translation.es: Debes meter todo el cuerpo para conocer al punto blanco.

translation.en: - She means the White Whale. - Yeah, the White Whale Dot.
translation.es: -Habla de la ballena blanca. -La ballena punto blanco.

translation.en: - Come on. - You've got this.
Keep going. One step at a time.
translation.es: Adelante. Un paso a la vez.

translation.en: - You got this. - Yeah. Keep going.
Now all you've gotta do is kick like we practiced.
Kick, kick, kick...
Way to go, Ollie!
- You're doing it! - I'm swimming. I'm swimming.
- Go, Ollie! - I'm swimming.
- You're swimming. - I'm swimming!
- Yeah, you are. - Woo- hoo!
I can't believe it.
I'm going to go underwater and meet the White Whale.
translation.es: Iré bajo el agua y conoceré a la ballena blanca.

translation.en: It's all thanks to you.
The Whale Dot's bigger now.
translation.es: El punto blanco es más grande.

translation.en: That means they're closer.
It's time.
Bye, Pixie, Juniper.
The next time I see you, this hoof will be the hoof
translation.es: Cuando vuelva, esta será la pezuña

translation.en: that's shaken the fin of the White Whale.
translation.es: que estrechó la aleta de la ballena blanca.

translation.en: You got this.
Have fun, sea unicorns.
- Ready for your head bubble? - Ready.
It'll feel a little different putting your head under the water.
translation.es: Se siente diferente poner la cabeza bajo el agua.

translation.en: It didn't work.
That's strange.
Here, let me try again.
I don't get it.
I've taken bubbles underwater before.
translation.es: Ya he llevado burbujas bajo el agua.

translation.en: But you've never taken a bubble that was around a unicorn's head.
translation.es: Pero nunca una que estuviera alrededor de una cabeza.

translation.en: Does that mean I can't?
- No. - Your spark has always been special.
We don't know what it can and can't do.
translation.es: No sabemos qué hace y qué no.

translation.en: Not even the grown- up unicorns understand the spark behind your head bubble.
translation.es: Ni los mayores entienden la chispa en tu burbuja.

translation.en: Don't worry, Ollie. We can still find a way.
There you are. We've been looking everywhere.
translation.es: Ahí estás. Te buscamos por todas partes.

translation.en: They're almost here. You don't wanna miss the White Whale, do you?
translation.es: Casi llegan. ¿Quieres perderte a la ballena blanca?

translation.en: It's okay, Kelp. You need to go. I don't want you to miss out.
translation.es: Está bien, Kelp. Debes irte. No quiero que te la pierdas.

translation.en: Actually, you need to go.
Kelp, what are you doing?
But if I have your head bubble, what will you do?
translation.es: Pero si tengo tu burbuja, ¿qué harás tú?

translation.en: Tell the White Whale I'll see them next year.
translation.es: Dile a la ballena que la veré el otro año.

translation.en: Someone's gotta come already, or we'll all miss them.
translation.es: Alguien debe venir o nos las perderemos.

translation.en: Ollie's coming. Take care of him, will you?
It's okay, Ollie. We've got you.
I can't wait for you to meet all my friends.
translation.es: Ya quiero que conozcas a mis amigos.

translation.en: Thank you, Kelp.
Don't thank me yet.
We've gotta make sure my head bubble works on you.
translation.es: Asegurémonos de que la burbuja funciona en ti.

translation.en: We got you, Ollie.
It works!
Look.
Wow. Cool.
Hi, Waverly. Hi, Cups.
Hi, Theo. This is my friend Ollie.
translation.es: Hola, Theo. Es mi amigo Ollie.

translation.en: Hi, Mrs. and Mrs. Shellska.
- Hi, Scallop. - Hi.
Hi, Mr. Pearly.
Hi, Mrs. Polypdoupolos.
Oh, Mom, Dad, look who I brought.
translation.es: Mamá, papá, miren a quién traje.

translation.en: This is Ollie. He's a unicorn like Kelp.
translation.es: Es Ollie. Un unicornio como Kelp.

translation.en: Why, hello, Ollie. We've heard a lot about you.
translation.es: Hola, Ollie. Hemos oído mucho de ti.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Tuskington.
Kelp's told me so much about his family.
translation.es: Kelp me habla mucho de su familia.

translation.en: I'm so happy to finally meet you.
Speaking of, where is Kelp?
He's not coming, Mrs. T.
Why not? He loves the White Whale.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Ama a la ballena blanca.

translation.en: He'd never miss them.
He's okay, Dad.
He's up with Pixie and Juniper.
There was only one of these bubble thingies.
translation.es: Solo había una de esas burbujas.

translation.en: And it's Ollie's dream to meet the White Whale and shake their fin.
translation.es: Y Ollie soñaba con conocer a la ballena y estrechar su aleta.

translation.en: Kelp made my dream come true.
Well, not yet, but...
- White Whale! -
- They're here! - We love you, White Whale!
We love you, White Whale!
The White Whale is here.
They're enormous.
Beautiful and enormous.
Psst. Shake their fin.
So nice to meet you.
And Kelp says hi too.
- Wow. - Did you see that?
They really are the size of a hundred elevator clouds.
translation.es: Sí tienen el tamaño de cien nubes.

translation.en: Thanks for visiting, White Whale.
See you next year.
Swim safely, White Whale.
